question: Which country has recently initiated a campaign named “Clean Plate Campaign 2.0” to reduce food wastage?
explanation:
China has initiated a new campaign to reduce food waste, called the “Clean Plate Campaign 2.0”. 
The campaign has been implemented after the Chinese President Xi Jinping highlighted that Covid-19 had created an alarming situation on food waste. The first version of Clean Plate Campaign was launched in 2013 which aimed at restricting excessive official feasts and receptions.
